thread.title: BRIEF-Finecobank Board Approves Issue Of Additional Tier 1 Notes For EUR 200 mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Finecobank Board Approves Issue Of Additional Tier 1 Notes For EUR 200 mln

organizations.name: brief-finecobank board approves issue of additional tier

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - FINECOBANK:
* BOARD APPROVES ISSUE OF ADDITIONAL TIER1, PERP NON CALL JUNE 2023 (5.5 YRS)
* SIZE IS EUR 200 MILLION AND NOTES ARE PERPETUAL AND FULLY SUBSCRIBED BY UNICREDIT
* COUPON IS FIXED AT 4.82% FOR THE INITIAL 5.5 YEARS * SAYS INTRA-GROUP PRIVATE PLACEMENT HAS SEVERAL BENEFITS IN TERMS OF EFFECTIVE COSTS SAVING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
